nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_270_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Could we take a walk? I feel like a little exercise.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_271_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Ms. Mbogo had made a bold decision: to run for mayor of Embu, Kenya.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_272_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Some leaders in Kenya were afraid of losing their power, so they tried everything to shut Kenyan women out of politics.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_273_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She decided long ago that she would study the subject in earnest as soon as she left school.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_274_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He was arrested because he was paid to spy on our air bases.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_275_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: After almost four hours of fierce negotiation, the President had the upper hand.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_276_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Victims of traffic accidents make up almost a quarter of the hospital's patients.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_277_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Ms. Mbogo's victory was important because all her male colleagues voted her in.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_278_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Two young men were originally hired to watch over the house as it was being built.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_279_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It is reported that government troops tried to break up the protest by firing their guns in the air.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_280_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She tore down the man's photograph, threw it into the wastebasket and walked out of the building.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_281_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Indeed, Mbogo was proud of the fact that she received warm greetings from the men of Embu.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_282_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: What they promise sounds impressive enoughâ€•let's see if they deliver the goods.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_283_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The husband laid out all her new clothes on the bed for her to choose.
